instructions: With the screen on, press and hold the Power key. In the options menu that displays, press and hold Power off . When 'Restart in Safe mode' displays, tap OK to restart in Safe mode. Upon restart, device displays 'Safe mode' at bottom of screen.

From any home screen, tap Apps > Settings . If using Tab view, select the General tab. Tap Apps . Tap the drop-down to view apps by: All apps Enabled Disabled Tap the desired app. Tap Uninstall > OK .
With the screen on, press and hold the Power key. In the options menu that displays, tap Power off and restart. The device restarts and 'Safe mode' overlay will no longer display.
